Class EntityManager

java.lang.Object
  com.snap2d.world.EntityManager
All Implemented Interfaces:
Renderable
public class EntityManager
extends Object
implements Renderable



Note: EntityManager is NOT thread safe. Only one thread should be responsible for modifying its data, or the Object must be synchronized externally.

Author:
Brian Groenke
